name: Park Tool FR-5.2G Cassette Lockring Tool
description: Make short work out of stubborn lockrings. Thin wall construction lets you easily remove lockrings without having to remove the cones or locknuts.Fits Shimano®, SRAM®, SunRace®, SunTour®, Chris King® and other cassette lockrings.Fits the SRAM® XX1® 11-speed cassettes.Also Fits Shimano® disc brake lockrings.1-inch base works with a wrench or bench vise.Built to last with a hardened tool steel body.Designed for use with hollow quick release axles, the 5mm guide pin stabilizes the tool.
